componentList.name: LyOption
componentList.inputs:
[
  "bg",
  "color",
  "raised",
  "disabled",
  "outlined",
  "elevation",
  "shadowColor",
  "disableRipple"
]

componentList.inputs:
[
  "tabIndex"
]

variableList.name: STYLE_PRIORITY
variableList.children: const STYLE_PRIORITY = -2

ngModuleList.name: LySelectModule
